params.universalProfile_: Address of the Universal Profile contract

params.quantity: The number of tokens to purchase (in token decimals)
params.tokenDecimals: The decimals of the token being purchased

returns.payment: The total payment required in LYX (including platform fee)

purchase(uint160,uint256).details: Buyer must send exact LYX amount calculated via getRequiredPayment()LYX value retrieved via _extendableMsgValue() (LSP17)

params.listingId: The ID of the listing to purchase from
params.quantity: The number of tokens to purchase

constructor.notice: Constructor sets the Universal Profile address

getRequiredPayment(uint256,uint256,uint8.notice: Calculate the required payment amount for a purchase

purchase(uint160,uint256).notice: Purchase AccessPass tokens from a listing
